Всем привет,эту игру я однозначно рекомендую несмотря на все баги и лаги этой игры,надеюсь что разработчики все таки все по фиксят и исправят.Еще хотелось бы затронуть отдельную тему на счет кемперов,надеюсь они с этим тоже что то сделают.

刚刚玩这个游戏的时候，一听到心跳声就马上躲起来或者躲进柜子，那个时候甚至连什么快翻都不知道，修发电机也是常常爆点，玩屠夫也是找不到人，即使找到人了砍完一刀下一秒就找不到人了，连看血迹听娇喘都不会，但是现在，玩久了之后（也不算很久吧= =）我发现我对这个游戏的掌控能力越来越好，虽然玩人大部分都是死，但是不会像以前一样那么怂了，游戏的环境，声音，屠夫的形象，已经融入了恐怖的主题，非常好玩的游戏，出现了bug官方也能及时修正，游戏里的技能也能搭配出各种各样的，玩法也有许多，黎明杀机这个游戏真的配得上这个价格，当然dlc里的东西也很nice，推荐入手，还看啥！！看完这里应该买游戏去！一起玩= =

The concept of the game looked very good, the gameplay was simple but still very good. 

Pros: 
+ The experience of horror was executed well.
+ Working together with friends was fun.
+ The bonus items and perks were well developed.
+ Price isn't that bad.

Cons:
- You couldn't play with friends in the start
- Trying to find a game could last hours (with friends you had to wait years to find a lobby)
- Too many bugs. (You could glitch in rocks, 50% of the time you joined nothing ... )
- Some things werent very balanced, there were a lot of spots that could be easily abused.
- Camping a hook as killer isn't fun. Even though the killer has a disadvantage with doing that. Especially when you are playing with friends and they are being camped so you cant save them. Not fun for a killer and not fun for the survivor.

Some of the big bugs have been fixed by now. The waiting time for joining games is shorter, but it could still last hours...

6,8/10 (If you have the patience to wait).

As a Color blind player i think Survivor is Ok
However i cannot play Killer as i cannot see the Red Chase scratches
i purely play survivor as it is the only aspect of the game i can play and for that i am missing out on 50% of this game

Now if i could have to option to make a KEY component to the killers gameplay... Blue then i would be able to actually play
Im not asking for a NEON sign that says SURVIVORS THIS WAY maybe just a color option that is not advantageos but gives the high number of color blind players the option to actually play with all the options someone who can see the bright red has.

Clearly your developpent team is not color blind so come to a choice of a Blue Hue that you can look at and think yea thats not different than the reds glow for me one way or the other its the same advantage... that way the color blind community can go from seeing nothing to actually having a chance.

I will not reccomend this game until there is an option for colorblindness this has been in every game i have played recently with a color based aspect and some with Multiple Colorblind options beyond Red/Green

A lot of people dislike this Dead by Daylight for whatever their reasons are, but i have definately enjoyed my time. I mostly play with my friends when i play, but even if im looking for a game to play by myself for a little bit i find myself coming here. Im by no means great at the game, but its still very enjoyable. If i die, its my own fault usually, my only wish is there was some form of communication between survivors, but at the same time it might make it too much for the killer so as much as i wish i do understand why its not there.

This game is tons of fun but, it can take some time to get the hang of.  Playing survivor is where it's at if you want the thrilling experience of being in a horror movie.  However, playing killer isn't quite as fun because of some cheap and annoying tactics taken by survivors.  Hopefully, the game will be balanced better in the future.

Avete presente il gioco del nascondino e dell'acchiapparella?
Ecco adesso fondeteli e ambientateli in un'atmosfera cupa, ed è così che vi viene in mente Dead by Daylight.
Dead by Daylight è collocato nella sezione dei giochi "Survival Horror", anche se devo ammettere che di horror ha ben poco, infatti solo nelle prime partite si potrebbe sentire quell'ansietta ma dopo non trasmette più nessuna emozione di ansia se non nei momenti in cui si sente il mostro vicino.
Dead by Daylight non è un gioco che può essere da casual gamer (questo solo se si vuole diventare decenti a scappare dal mostro).
Il gioco presenta due modalità di gioco, o meglio due "squadre", i killer e i sopravissuti.
I primi dovranno cercare di uccidere tutti i sopravissuti per darli in sacrificio all'entità, questa è infatti la "conduttrice del gioco" che prima di mangiare i sopravissuti li usa per giocarci e per far divertire i killer.
Poi ci sono i sopravissuti, questi dovranno scappare dai killer per restare in vita, anche se non per molto, visto che questi una volta scappati verranno rimandati al loro campo in un bosco per poi essere rimandati nell'arena di gioco.
Entrambe le squadre devono inoltre completare una ragnatela sanguinaria dove potranno trovare oggetti/offerte per l'entità/competenze, salendo di livello nelle tele sanguinarie interverrà l'entità che inzierà a bloccare oggetti della tela con il suo potere.
Adesso elencherò i pro e i contro del gioco.
PRO:
- Il gioco, contrariamete al pensiero di molte persone, è molto longevo.
- Il gameplay è abbastanza dinamico.

CONTRO:
- Il gioco è quasi un totale bug ma alla fine non danno neanche tanto fastidio.
- Le partite vengono hostate direttamente dai killer che la maggior parte della volta laggano e rendono il gioco ingiocabile.
- I killer dei dlc sono molto più forti e OP degli altri killer ed è quasi impossibile scappargli.

Detto questo consiglio alle persone di non chiedere il rimborso del gioco perché questo gioco richiede molto allenamento e quindi non è giudicabile entro le 2 ore concesse da Steam.
Detto questo nonostante i contro siano maggiori dei pro consiglio comunque l'acquisto di questo titolo alle persone interessate.

Mega gutes Spiel! So viele spielbare Chars, die man alle unterschiedlich spielen und aufleveln kann. Wäre noch cool wenn es Chapters wie z.B. Nightmare on Elmstreet geben würde mit Freddy Krüger als Killer die Klassiker halt. Michael gibt es ja schon :)

Holy hell this game is FUN. It has a lot of replayability, a generally good community, and even the occassional troll is entertaining. I haven't played much yet, but I look forward to putting a lot of hours into it.

Update: ~250 hours into DBD, and it's still a helluva good time. For the people complaining about toxicity, it's easily avoided - don't read the post-game chat. And remember, this isn't inherently a team game; survivors may choose to work together or throw one another under the bus. In my opinion, the opportunity for team sabotage and spontaneous cooperation from the killer is one of my favorite aspects of the game and keeps it fun.

Keep up the great work!

Маленький обзор игры(нет, уходи отсюда если лень читать) 
__________________________________________________________________________

                                                                     + ПЛЮСЫ +
__________________________________________________________________________

1. Игру с каждем патчем балансируют, поэтому игра довольно баланса.
2. Большое количетсво перков, до патча 2.1.0 , было 4 перка которые надо юзать чтобы победить, теперь все перки сбалансировали
3. Важна командная работа, поэтому если у вас есть 3 друга, то собирайте их и играйте спокойно!)
4. Игра довольно популярна
__________________________________________________________________________

                                                                     - МИНУСЫ - 
__________________________________________________________________________

1. МАНЬЯК СЛАБЕЙ СУРВА, А ЕСЛИ ВЫ 4 В ПАТИ , ТО ВЫ ВЫЕБЕТЕ ЕГО ВО ВСЕ ДЫРЫ, он даже не поймёт как вы загенрашите и сбежите!
2.ТОКСИКОВ ДОХУИЩА(как за маньяка, так и за сурва)
3. За маньяка долго ищет игры!
__________________________________________________________________________

Я ненавижу комьюнити этой игры.

Я наиграл в эту игру <130 часов, и видимо больше не наиграю. Я дам вам совет перед ее покупкой (НЕ В КОЕМ СЛУЧАЕ НЕ ИГРАЙТЕ СЛИШКОМ ХОРОШО). Итак перейдём собственно к моей истории.
Решил я значит сыграть за призрака каточку, ок, да? В катку попались два читака, со взломанными шмотками (первый был на двайте с лысиной и футболкой с лицом трапера, второй был с футболкой стримера, с закрытым профилем). Как я понял по сути игры, они были в пати, так как спасали друг друга по кд. Один из них, как оказалось, был знаком с русским модератором dbd (что кстати и стала отправной точкой, моего бана). Ой, совсем забыл сказать, что МНЕ ДАЛИ БАН!!! После той злополучной катки, я и получил Игровую блокировку(иначе в коментах меня за*бали). И всё, 3,14здец, за что дали бан? почему? Объяснения не дали до сих пор (обзор написан 22.07.17). Что делать незнаю, просто -500 рублей.

Сама игра не плоха, но из-за одного индивудуума, которому не понравилась моя игра, все пошло по 3,14зде...

02.08.17. Первого сурва с лысиной и футболкой трапера - забанили в игре

Прошёл месяц, как вы думаете, ответили ли мне разработчики?
Цитата разработчиков : "Благодарим за предоставленную информацию. Ваше дело в настоящее время рассматривается. Пожалуйста, дайте нам 2 недели, чтобы рассмотреть ваше дело. Мы свяжемся с Вами, как только мы это решить". Нет, еще раз подмечу что разработчикам по*уй на своё комьюнити, и еще раз не порекомендую взять эту блевотную игру.

I have to start off by saying that I really do love this game. I'm super-late to the party, having only purchased during this most recent summer sale, but it's quickly become an obsession. That being said, I can only give this game a 3/5 for the following reason: the lobby feature is super-sketchy and sometimes you have to wait a ridiculously long-time to play. The wait is affected by a number of factors, including being dropped by the matchmaking service, problems with authentication for some reason, and just good ol' fashioned being locked in some kind of cue limbo. It's a truly dissapointing fail on the developers end because the rest of the game is wonderfully addictive and great fun.
